item.title: Trump revels in mass federal firings and jeers at Biden before adoring conservative crowd
item.description: President Donald Trump addressed an adoring crowd at the Conservative Political Action Conference in suburban Washington on Saturday.

item.title: What we know about Dan 'Razin' Caine, Trump's pick to be the top U.S. military officer
item.description: Trump said Caine was his pick as the next Joint Chiefs of Staff chairman, in the same social media post in which he fired Air Force Gen. CQ Brown Jr.
